title: purchase rp
body:
an error pops up saying card information invalid but i checked it and its not incorrect, I have purchased in the past with this same card. cant buy skins, does riot not want to take my money{{sticker:zombie-nunu-tears}} 

o btw  i funds in my account to purchase

replies.body:
Hey there,

The best course of action in this case is to [submit a ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/requests/new) to Player Support directly, we here on the boards are unable to assist with billing inquiries.
i rang my bank to see why it wasnt letting me purchase off you guys they said that i have no blocks or restrictions on my card so it must be an error on riots end{{champion:32}}
